response.job_title: AI Director | Machine Learning | Data Scientist | Big Data | Problem Solving | Data Visualization | Statistical Analysis and Computing | Programming | Chemical Engineer | Audit
response.summary:
With a strong drive to make a difference, I am passionate about using data analytics to drive meaningful business outcomes. Experienced in programming languages such as Python, SQL, R, and various data manipulation, analysis, and visualization tools including Power BI, Data Studio, and Tableau.
Highly understanding of Machine Learning Algorithms, and libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Scikit Learn, Tensor Flow, and Keras. Usage of Relational Database Management Systems namely MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and No-SQL including MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis, and Neo4j. Use of Big Data Engine including Hadoop, and Apache Spark, and usage of cloud services from AWS and GCP.
response.skills: Microsoft SQL Server, Panel de control, Microsoft Azure, Auditoría, Expresiones de análisis de datos (DAX), Prompt Engineering, Análisis de negocio, PROMPT, ChatGPT, Bots conversacionales, Inteligencia artificial, Desarrollo de software, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), Extraer, transformar y cargar (ETL), Inteligencia empresarial, Herramientas ETL, Minería de datos, Big data, Tableau, Microsoft Visual Studio Code

profile_positions.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) leader with a proven track record of developing and executing successful AI initiatives. Expertise in a wide range of AI and Gen AI technologies, including machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.

profile_positions.description: Experienced in developing and deploying predictive models for a variety of industries, including finance, oil and, gas and retail. Skilled in the use of various programming languages and statistical and machine learning techniques.

profile_positions.title: Audit Analyst for palm oil plants

profile_positions.description:

Worked within an-Agile team, and helped ensure prioritization of the biggest impact features on products and performing optimization tests
Generated day-to-day operations plans, improving workflow and efficiency of the deodorization plant

profile_positions.description:
Organizing workflow by assigning responsibilities and preparing schedules daily/weekly and monthly
Train new employees on how to safely use machinery and follow procedures
Check production output according to specifications applying Colombian and international procedures and norms

profile_positions.description:
Assisting with various departmental duties and providing academic support to Professors and other staff
